Logger object¶

Differents level are available :
  • debug
  • info
  • warning
  • error
  • critical

Examples of usage:

from kivy.logger import Logger
Logger.notice('This is a notice')
Logger.debug('This is a notice')

try:
    raise Exception('bleh')
except Exception, e:
    Logger.exception(e)

Logger can be controled in the Kivy configuration.

kivy.logger.Logger¶

Kivy default logger instance

kivy.logger.LoggerHistory¶

Kivy history handler

alias of HistoryHandler
